Climbing Kit - Your Ultimate Adventure Companion

Climbing in Bali - An Experience of a Lifetime

Bali offers some of the most breathtaking climbing experiences, with mountain treks, challenging cliffs, and scenic views that will leave you speechless.

Rating: 4.8/5

Kit Information

Our climbing kit is designed for both beginners and seasoned climbers. It includes everything you need for a safe and successful climbing journey.

  • Rope - 50m, 10mm thick, durable and lightweight
  • Climbing Harness - Adjustable for comfort
  • Helmet - Impact-resistant with adjustable straps
  • Carabiners - 3 heavy-duty, lockable carabiners
  • Climbing Shoes - Flexible and comfortable, suitable for all terrains
